column17:
Victoria's Secret Pink Eau de Parfum - 75 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2700

Fun and flirty - Victoriaâ€™s Secret Pink embodies the attitude of the modern woman who is bold fearless and goes through life on her own terms. This luxury perfume brings together a host of natural ingredients that weaves together to form a unique fragrance. The floral green accords that dominate this Eau de Parfum emboldens you to march ahead and carve your own niche.

Opening with a aromatic combination of sweet bergamot ripe hints of mandarin strong violet leaves along with the smooth scent of artemisia and spicy juniper berries. Travelling into the heart note you can take in the clean hints of lily in the valley sweet and citrusy neroli fragrant peony and light tints of freesia. The base note combines the distinct waft of sandalwood with strong musk rich vanilla and woody hints of vetiver. This perfume is dominated by floral green hints that give out a light and sensual aroma. The bottle is very chic and minimalist channelling the kind of urban woman who would dab on this perfume everyday. The transparent perfume accentuates the clear glass bottle that encases it and makes a statement wherever it is placed. Bask in the unbound glory of the dauntless feminine spirit that looks for a new adventure everyday.
